Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Buildings.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservers

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObservers
    Creates new Class called Room, instantiating required Properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, Floor floor)
      Populate room object with name, type with default mode of "Normal" and register the room object to Observers.
